external_games.name: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 1 - Renaissance, Baroque no Kyoshou

name: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 1 - Renaissance, Baroque no Kyoshou
summary: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 1: Renaissance, Baroque no Kyoshou is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Interchannel, which was released in Japan in 2007. Players complete jigsaw puzzles of various sizes and challenge levels to reveal stunning works of classical artwork.
